posts.post_content:
Doubling Season. Parallel Lives. Endless Hoard of the Undead.
  
   
etc. and so forth. it's the ultimate token card. everything you can think of to do with tokens, you can do with this. (I DON'T recommend Essence of the Wild, as it turns them forcibly into vanilla creatures. there are probably even more broken things you can do if you get creative with Gatherer)

Posted By: GengilOrbios (10/1/2011 9:52:28 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
My friend made a deck which he called Brains!  
At first I thought it was a WU control deck, but when he started playing BG lands, ramping up mana making zombies everywhere, i knew that I am gonna face this card.. At turn five or six I think, he cast this with a lone Cemetery Reaper out..   
He was like: "Should we continue this?"  
On my turn: I cast Slagstorm to kill the zombies.. "Yeah, we continue.."  
He played another one with no more Cemetery Reaper..   
I summoned Massacre Wurm and he was ready for game 2..  
  
The next game after some sideboarding, pretty much the same thing happened.. But this time, I have no Slagstorms nor Massacre Wurms in my hand.. He cast this while having two Cemetery Reapers out.. I was behind and was losing.. But I still have Balefire Dragon in my hand and Urabrask the Hidden out.. I drew my card, (Blasphemous Act).. I showed him my hand and he conceded.. =)  
   
Lesson: keep board sweepers always at the ready.. You never know when will those zombies come knocking on... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:

He was like: "Should we continue this?"
On my turn: I cast Slagstorm to kill the zombies.. "Yeah, we continue.."
He played another one with no more Cemetery Reaper..
I summoned Massacre Wurm and he was ready for game 2..

The next game after some sideboarding, pretty much the same thing happened.. But this time, I have no Slagstorms nor Massacre Wurms in my hand.. He cast this while having two Cemetery Reapers out.. I was behind and was losing.. But I still have Balefire Dragon in my hand and Urabrask the Hidden out.. I drew my card, (Blasphemous Act).. I showed him my hand and he conceded.. =)

posts.post_content:
I agree with everyone saying that this is what mythics should be. It's big, dumb, and big. Card drops, jaws drop. I'm glad that zombies are being seen in hordes. That's how it should be.
  
   
My only complaint is that they didn't make the flashback cost cheaper; why not reward hardcasters with twice the zombies while rewarding "reanimators" with a lower cost? Still has to be a 5/5, though!
posts.html:
I agree with everyone saying that this is what mythics should be. It's big, dumb, and big. Card drops, jaws drop. I'm glad that zombies are being seen in hordes. That's how it should be.

My only complaint is that they didn't make the flashback cost cheaper; why not reward hardcasters with twice the zombies while rewarding "reanimators" with a lower cost? Still has to be a 5/5, though!
